game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart by temporal rifts. Players take on the role of a Chronokeeper, tasked with repairing the timestream and preventing catastrophic future events. Along the way, they must confront rogue time travelers, ancient beings, and rival factions vying for control of the timeline.
game.beginning: The game begins in the ruins of a once-great city, where the player discovers a mysterious artifact known as the Timekeeper's Chalice. This ancient relic imbues them with the power to manipulate time and sets them on their perilous journey to restore the timestream.
game.ending: After navigating through alternate timelines and eras, the player ultimately faces off against a powerful entity known only as 'The Time Reaver.' If successful, they will repair the timeline and create a new future where humanity can thrive. However, failure will lead to a catastrophic convergence of timelines, resulting in the destruction of all existence.
